experience.description: Conducted extensive research on stochastic modeling for mortality rate forecasting. Developed predictive algorithms using R to analyze historical social security data and assess long-term life expectancy trends for pension fund adjustments.

Collaborated on a project evaluating the impact of catastrophe risk on regional property insurance portfolios. Used Monte Carlo simulations to model loss distributions and performed sensitivity analyses on various reinsurance structures.

Authored a comprehensive research paper on the application of Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) to non-life insurance pricing. Cleaned and processed large-scale claims datasets to optimize frequency and severity modeling techniques.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
